title: Venue Information
description: PARIS 2025 will take place at Communauté Chrétienne du Point du Jour, a beautiful venue in Boulogne-Billancourt, just outside Paris.

address.name: Communauté Chrétienne du Point du Jour

transport.title: From Paris and the Ile-de-France region
transport.corentin: Metro line 10 - Boulogne Pont de Saint-Cloud station
transport.mairie: Metro line 9 - Pont de Sèvres station (10 minutes walk)
transport.porte: Tramway T2 - Parc de Saint-Cloud station
transport.rer: RER C - Boulogne Pont de Saint-Cloud station, then 10 minutes walk
